revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/Aeyesi|Aeyesi]] ([[User talk:Aeyesi|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:Gez|Gez]]
revision.text:
{{WarnDeprecated|the modern [[DECORATE]] format}}
DEHSUPP is an internal lump that defines the data [[DeHackEd]] works on. Older ZDoom versions allowed replacing this lump with a custom version so that modifying actors which are not part of the original set was possible.
Current versions of ZDoom no longer allow DEHSUPP modifications. Any user-provided replacement lump will be simply ignored, and a warning displayed on startup.
However, the [[ZDaemon]] port allows use of custom DEHSUPP lumps instead of supporting [[DECORATE]], so any DEHACKED lump found in a mod with a DEHSUPP lump will also be ignored.
[[category:ZDoom special lumps]]
